name: AncientBeetmon
description: AncientBeetlemon is a chimeric Digimon whose upper body is a humanoid Rhinoceros beetle ( Trypoxylus dichotomus ) covered in a blue and yellow armor-like exoskeleton with spikes on its shoulders and large falx at the end of its arms. Its head is eyeless and has a yellow crest on top and a long horn that forks at the tip. It has six pairs of yellow wings on its back. Its lower body is a red Stag beetle ( Lucanus cervus ) with six eyes. It has six legs with black thighs. It has white muscle in the torso, the brachium of its arms and its legs.
